block.p: An article yesterday about a town hall meeting held by Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani in Rochester referred incorrectly in some copies to his remarks about whether he would seek the endorsement of the Independence Party if Patrick J. Buchanan was its presidential nominee. The mayor said he would ''have to think long and hard,'' adding, ''I probably wouldn't want to be on that ticket.'' He did not explicitly say he would not appear on the ticket with Mr. Buchanan.
